import React from 'react'; const Calendar = () => { var curr = new Date; // get current date var first = curr.getDate() - curr.getDay(); // First day is the day of the month - the day of the week var last = first + 6; // last day is the first day + 6 var firstday = new Date(curr.setDate(first)).toUTCString(); var lastday = new Date(curr.setDate(last)).toUTCString(); return ( <>
15/01-21/01

some characters
); } export default Calendar;
